title: Card choice condition
description: A condition that requires the presence of a matching card on the tabletop.

elementId.title: Element ID
elementId.description: The ID of the card to match.

aspects.title: Aspects
aspects.description: Require the matching card to have these aspects.

unique.title: Unique
unique.description: Requires the matching card to be or not be unique.

forbiddenAspects.title: Forbidden Aspects
forbiddenAspects.description: Deny any card with any of the given aspects.

forbiddenElementIds.title: Forbidden Element IDs
forbiddenElementIds.description: Deny any cards that match one of the given element ids.

ageBias.title: Age Bias
ageBias.description: Choose either the oldest or youngest card available.  Oldest will choose the card with the largest lifetime remaining, Youngest will choose the card with the least lifetime remaining.
